name: multiaxial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized considering many different things when making a judgment, especially about a person's mental health: A multiaxial system of diagnosis was introduced. A key step was the introduction of a multiaxial classification for all types of disorders. The complete multi-axial format may be required.
involving many different features: They sought to operationalize and test a multiaxial model of continuity of care. These multiaxial acts of violence were perpetrated with a total disrespect for the person. Synonym
multidimensional
engineering, mathematics
  specialized involving more than one axis (= an imaginary line through the centre of something): A multiaxial loading machine was developed. The program includes a multi-axial drawing tool. Related word
axial
